features.situation: to other's intimidation skill due to your size

89db5292-6df2-440d-adef-63409a687372.name: Damage Resistance (Flexible; Tough Skin)
89db5292-6df2-440d-adef-63409a687372.notes: Flexible (-20%, doesn't protect against crushing damage); Tough Skin (-40%, doesn't protect against touch or scratches)

features.situation: to HT rolls made for survival at -HP or below, and on any HT roll where failure means instant death. If this bonus makes the difference between success and failure, you collapse, apparently dead (or disabled), but come to in the usual amount of time. A successful Diagnosis roll reveals the truth.

06b876d5-ec15-47ea-929a-5787cb81adaa.name: Longevity
06b876d5-ec15-47ea-929a-5787cb81adaa.notes: You fail aging rolls only on a 17 or 18, or only on an 18 if your modified HT is 17 or better

d99dff67-ac78-41d9-9630-3af308815330.name: Racial Quirk: Never forget a favour or an injury

5e85c365-4d8a-46e0-b7d8-1c748d02b1af.name: Racial Quirk: Do not like to live underground

features.situation: from any employer of your craft skills

5f013889-17c0-4024-8c78-91c44e9e4f65.text: Gnomes are close kin of the Dwarves and are somewhat shorter and slighter than their cousins (Gnomes are 2' shorter and 50lb heavier than a human of the same Strength).  They keep their beards trimmed close (whether this is an aesthetic decision or just a desire to be different from their racial kin, is a matter of some debate).
